title: Check Network Capacity Before Adding Service
description: Before sales can sell a large new service, the agent must verify there is enough network capacity to support it.

tasks.description: Retrieve the bandwidth requirements for the new service from the service catalog.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the new service requires 10 Gbps of dedicated bandwidth.

tasks.description: Check the current utilization of the edge router that will serve the customer.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the router has 20 Gbps of available capacity.

tasks.description: Confirm that there is sufficient capacity and notify the sales team that they can proceed.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sends a confirmation to the sales team.
